title: How to set a club tag in new client
body:
Hello,
can I ask how can I set a Club Tag in new client? I tried everything and cannot find it. Yes, we do have 5 members in it.
Thank you for any advice.

replies.body:
Clubs options are available in the update client's profile area, where you can find a section called Clubs.  Some features are still in testing, though, so if you run into any trouble you can still use the legacy client to make modifications:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!

https://imgur.com/a/yVkzq

This is my view of both clients and neither of those work. I hit play on the legacy client and it opens the new one.
The new one does not have a "Launch Legacy Client" option.
The profiles section only allows toggling club tag visibility.

I am having the same issue, I want to set my club tag (it has none, and way more than 5 members)

Edit: Solution found in other thread posting here for solution visibility: 
In the new client go to your profile, clubs, then click the PADLOCK next to your club name
